name: LikeLoveHate
overview: React to media with Like, Love, or Hate
description: Adds Like, Love, and Hate reaction buttons to media item detail pages using Material Design icons.

versions.changelog:
## Whats New

### Configurable Reaction Colors
Admins can now customize the highlight color for Like, Love, and Hate buttons in the plugin settings page. Includes color pickers with hex input and a Reset to Defaults button.
